llm_res.rule: MUST trigger when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers.
Returns the number of decimals the token uses - e.g. 8, means to divide the token amount by 100000000 to get its user representation.
Transfers of 0 values must be treated as normal transfers and fire the `Transfer` event.
llm_res.function: function transferFrom(address sender, address recipient, uint256 amount) public virtual override returns (bool)
